description: The table contains information about a patient's most recent outstanding follow-up actions from Cervical Cancer Screenings.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CCS_FOLLOWUP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The specific cervical cancer screening (CCS) follow-up action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
